Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute near 111th/Ashland
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Dr  buses rrtd SB: 111th, Marshfield, 112th Pl, Montrey, Vincennes, & 111th; NB: Vincennes, Montrey, Hamlet & 111th near 111th/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 111th/Ashland.

Southbound buses will operate via 111th, Marshfield, 112th Pl, Montrey, Vincennes & 111th.

Northbound buses will operate via Vincennes, Montrey, Hamlet & 111th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/86th
ShortDescription: NB 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 87th, Vincennes, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/86th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 87th, Vincennes, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/86th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
